Module it.polimi.ingsw.psp40
Package it.polimi.ingsw.psp40.controller.strategies.strategyMove

Class DefaultMove

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.psp40.controller.strategies.strategyMove.DefaultMove
All Implemented Interfaces:
StrategyMove
Direct Known Subclasses:
DoubleMove, OthersCantLevelUp, PushEnemyWorker, SwapWorker
public class DefaultMove
extends java.lang.Object
implements StrategyMove
This class is used to define the default rules to move a Worker
Author:
sup3rgiu

    java.util.List<Cell> getAdjCells​(Cell cell)
    This method is used to get the adjacent cells of a specified cell, removing the ones where there is a slope > +1 block This is used if the strategy OthersCantLevelUp is enabled
    java.util.List<Cell> getAvailableCells​(Worker worker)
    This method is used to get from the Model a list of Cell where a worker can move according to the default rules

    • getAdjCells

      public java.util.List<Cell> getAdjCells​(Cell cell)
      This method is used to get the adjacent cells of a specified cell, removing the ones where there is a slope > +1 block This is used if the strategy OthersCantLevelUp is enabled
      Specified by:
      getAdjCells in interface StrategyMove
      Parameters:
      cell - where you want to check the movable cells, excluding going up a level
      Returns:
      a list of Cell which are adjacent to the input parameter, excluding the possibility to go up a level
